long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transcribe and summarize Youtube, Google Meet, lectures using MeetMemos. Get the transcription and summary! Summarize * GPT4 * YouTube * Google Meets * Zoom * Lecture * Video * Audio

Meetmemos is your ultimate Chrome extension for transforming your online meetings, lectures, and media experiences. Harnessing the combined powers of ChatGPT and Whisper technologies, Meetmemos offers seamless transcription and summarization of audio and video content across popular platforms like YouTube, Google Meet, and Zoom.

Features at a Glance:
Advanced Transcription: Instantly convert speech from videos and meetings into text with high accuracy.
Smart Summarization: Get concise summaries of long lectures or meetings, capturing all essential points.

What’s Coming Next:

Interactive Summary Chat: Dive deeper into your summaries through an interactive chat feature, discussing key insights and takeaways.
Multi-Device Synchronization: Access your transcripts and summaries effortlessly across all your devices.
Ongoing AI Improvements: We're committed to continually enhancing accuracy and expanding our feature set.
Your Privacy Matters:
Meetmemos prioritizes your privacy. In alignment with OpenAI’s strict privacy standards, we ensure that your interactions are secure and your personal data is not stored. Please note that while Meetmemos utilizes OpenAI technologies, it is an independent development and is not officially associated with ChatGPT or OpenAI.

We’re Listening:
Your feedback fuels our innovation. Share your ideas for new templates or features to enrich your Meetmemos experience further. Connect with us via [your preferred feedback channel].

Unlock the full potential of your digital communications with Meetmemos—where technology meets efficiency.
